abstracts.cdata!:
USDRP enter the final phase of
            implementation on May 31, 2013. In preparing the final stage
            of the project, the Directorate General of Human Settlements
            (Ministry of Public Works) implement a series of activities
            as part of the Exit Strategy to maintain the sustainability
            of this project, both in central level and regional level in
            Indonesia, prior to the closing of the project. This book is
            documentation of the lesson learn and experiences in
            managing USDRP for 7 years, resources are from various
            parties in the central level and the regional level. It is
            contain constructive information that can be used in the future.
